name: FEDERAZIONE ENERGIA MODA CHIMICA E AFFINI
goal: FEMCA CISL REPRESENTS THE ITALIAN WORKERS IN THE ENERGY (OIL, GAS WATER), CHEMICAL (RUBBER, PLASTICS, PHARMACEUTICAL, GLASS, CERAMICS), AND TEXTILE (GARMENT, LEATHER, FOOTWEAR, ACCESSORIES)
interests: Competition, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
SECTORAL SOCIAL DIALOGUE
COLLECTIVE BARGAINING
LABOUR MARKET
GENDER POLICY
INDUSTRIAL POLICY
ENVIRONMENTAL POLICY
LABOUR LAW
VET AND TECH EDUCATION
